FuncDef: The display ipv6 host command displays the static IPv6 DNS table. The display ipv6 host command displays the static IPv6 DNS table. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. The VPN instance name cannot be _public_. If the character string is quoted by double quotation marks, the character string can contain spaces.
